New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 92 runs off 41 balls, his fastest fifty in all T20s
Rohit Sharma hit 200 sixes in T20Is, a record
India's score of 205 is their fastest in T20 World Cups
Key Match Events: Travis Head fell to Jasprit Bumrah
Maxwell was dismissed by Kuldeep Yadav
Mitchell Marsh provided two catching chances on 0 and 5 but was not caught
Pre-Game Insights: Australia left out a spinner for a fast bowler for this game
Mitchell Starc was back in the team for Ashton Agar
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's performance was the reason India made it to the semi-finals
Australia may need Bangladesh to beat Afghanistan to make the final four
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was the same one used for the England vs South Africa game where 163 was defended
The weather was cooler with potential for swing in the air
Others: The game was played in St Lucia
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
